result.eng: I hope you didn't steal all the money.
result.ga: Tá súil agam nár ghoid tú an t-airgead sin go léir
result.orig: Tá súil agam nár ghoid tú an t-airgead sin go léir
result.html: Tá súil agam nár ghoid tú an t-airgead sin go léirI hope you didn't steal all the money.
result.ponchtml: Tá súil agam nár ġoid tú an t-airgead sin go léirI hope you didn't steal all the money.

result.eng: He didn't really want to steal.
result.ga: Ní raibh rún ar bith gadaíochta aige
result.orig: Ní raibh rún ar bith gadaíochta aige
result.html: Ní raibh rún ar bith gadaíochta aigeHe didn't really want to steal.
result.ponchtml: Ní raiḃ rún ar biṫ gadaíoċta aigeHe didn't really want to steal.

result.eng: All you need to care aboit in this world is to steal in a way the law allows.
result.ga: Is cuma duit ar an tsaol seo ach goid de réir dlí
result.orig: Is cuma duit ar an tsaol seo ach goid de réir dlí
result.html: Is cuma duit ar an tsaol seo ach goid de réir dlíAll you need to care aboit in this world is to steal in a way the law allows.
result.ponchtml: Is cuma duit ar an tsaol seo aċ goid de réir dlíAll you need to care aboit in this world is to steal in a way the law allows.
